title: "Tech start-up uses AI and robotics to tackle UK’s pothole problem"
excerpt: "A North West start-up has developed an automated vehicle capable of fixing cracks and potholes on UK roads. Robotiz3d, based at the Science and Technology Facilities Council’s (STFC) Daresbury Laboratory, is combining artificial intelligence (AI) with advanced robotics to tackle the pothole problem."
